answer: RAG（Retrieval-Augmented Generation）是一种结合信息检索与生成模型的技术，通过检索相关信息来增强生成文本的准确性和丰富性。
citations: "RAG combines the strengths of retrieval and generation to produce more informed and contextually relevant outputs." - AI Research Journal
"By integrating retrieval mechanisms, RAG significantly improves the quality of generated responses in conversational AI systems." - Tech Innovations Review
